attributes.action: look at interest charged on legal aid fees
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: needed legal aid to get divorce, i was the innocent party but am left with resulting bill, i am 75 and dont mind paying bill in instalments but the interest means i can never finish, looks as though i will eventualy have no home to leave to my children, this is so unfair, does any one care?
